channel.title: Project on Welcome, I'm Gary
channel.description: Recent content in Project on Welcome, I'm Gary

item.title: Analysis of Ads Spending
item.description: In this project, I resampling methods and statistical test (t-test, Mann-Whitney test, ANOVA) to analyze ads spending data

item.title: EHR Symptom Detection
item.description: In this project, I used deep learning to identify symptoms in electronic health records.

item.title: Mobile Game A/B Testing: Cookie Cats
item.description: In this project, I performed A/B testing to help a mobile game decide whether to change a core feature.

item.title: Disaster Tweets Detector
item.description: This project aims to detect tweets that signal disastrous events.

item.title: Crunchbase Founder Analysis
item.description: In this project, I used random forest and XGBoost to classify whether a startup is successful.

item.title: Instacart Market Baskey Analysis
item.description: In this project, I predicted next purchases from Instacart’s customer purchases data using XGBoost.
